title: Valheim On Xbox Series X | S - 15 Things To Know BEFORE YOU BUY
description:
As soon as it launched for PC in early access a little over two years ago, Valheim became an instant phenomenon, almost overnight. Iron Gate Studio's survival title has been held up as one of the best games the genre has seen in recent years, and has continued to go from strength to strength in the time since its launch. 

And while there's no word yet on when the game will launch in full, it will be hitting a pretty major milestone soon nonetheless, with a Game Preview release on Xbox Series X/S and Xbox One coming up in just a few days' time. If that will be your first time jumping into Valheim, there are a few things that you should know about the game that we'll be going over in this feature.

title: TOP 15 PS2 Games of All Time [2023 Edition]
description:
There’s a reason the PlayStation 2 laid the foundation for Sony’s domination in the console market – effectively killing off Sega as hardware manufacturer and siphoning sales from GameCube – and that’s it’s incredibly diverse library of essential games. Put simply: the amount of quality titles on Sony’s second home console is simply staggering. 

Compiling a list of just 15 of the best PS2 games is nigh-on impossible, but it’s fair to say those games that have made the cut are up there as some of the best video games ever made.
